

#############################
CNOLAB.DATA documentation
#############################


Motivation 
###########

The package `cellnopt.data <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/cellnopt.wrapper/>`_
provides tools to ease the access to model or data sets to be used within
cellnopt packages.


Installation
###################

prerequisites
===============

Of course, you will need to install `Python <http://www.python.org/download/>`_
(linux and mac users should have it installed already). 

We recommend also to install `ipython <http://ipython.org/>`_, which provides a more flexible shell alternative to the
python shell itself.

installation
================
Since **cellnopt.data** is available on `PyPi <http://pypi.python.org/>`_, the following command should install the package and its dependencies automatically:: 

    easy_install cellnopt.data

.. note:: easy_install may require root permission (under linux, use sudo). If
   you do not have root permission, use a python virtualenv package.
